skills.skill: American Heart Association Basic Life Support (BLS)

duties_responsibilities.duty: Collaborate with physicians to provide the best care for patients.
Develop skills through a wide range of educational programs.
Maintain high safety standards and professional development.
Obtain and maintain the required credentials and certifications.

education_certification.credential: Graduate of education program approved by the credentialing body for the required credential(s) applicable to this role
Twelve months registered nurse experience in a healthcare environment
Texas RN license or temporary TX RN license, should obtain permanent license within 90 days. Compact license acceptable according to current Board of Nursing requirements
American Heart Association Basic Life Support (BLS)
Other credentials and certifications as defined by unit/service line
